EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The number of reads merged. Reads which are adjacent to each other may be merged for efficiency. Multiple reads may become one before it is handed to the disk, and it will be counted (and queued) as only one I/O.

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The time in seconds spent writing

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The time in seconds spent in I/O operations

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Number of bytes in per second

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The number of writes merged. Writes which are adjacent to each other may be merged for efficiency. Multiple writes may become one before it is handed to the disk, and it will be counted (and queued) as only one I/O.

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The time in seconds spent reading

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The percent of disk time spent on I/O operations

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Percentage of time that the CPU or CPUs were idle during which the system had an outstanding disk I/O request

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The number of bytes written per second

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: CPU Speed in terms of MHz

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The last time that the system was started

EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Total amount of memory displayed in KBs

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The number of bytes read per second

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The number of bytes read per second

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Number of bytes out per second

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Total amount of swap space displayed in KBs

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: The weighted time in seconds spend in I/O operations. This measures each I/O start, I/O completion, I/O merge, or read of these stats by the number of I/O operations in progress times the number of seconds spent doing I/O.

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Percent of time since boot idle CPU

EXTRA_ELEMENT.NAME: DESC
EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Percentage of CPU utilization that occurred while executing at the user level

EXTRA_ELEMENT.VAL: Maximum percent used for all partitions
